main event: A round aluminum-colored object was observed in the sky over Colorado Springs for 10-15 minutes, changing shape as it tumbled end-over-end.
interesting points: Witnesses estimated the object's size to be slightly larger than a full moon,The object traveled slightly faster than the speed of sound,The sighting was classified under Project Blue Book and involved U.S. Air Force observations,The object made no noticeable sound during the sighting,Various weather conditions reported during the observation included clear skies with no wind.
witness description: An Air Force sergeant and a civilian.
